Why (not) R for making maps?

Why R Why not R
No GUI
statistical programming language statistical programming language

Spatial data as regular data

The “tidyverse”

Self-learn suggestions

https://geocompr.robinlovelace.net/adv-map.html

Worked example: rail & industry in 1851 England

Data-source: The occupational structure of Britain 1379-1911, Cambridge Group for the History of Population and Social Structure.

Illustrating through exampes common steps for common thematic maps:

  1. Get an appropriate blank map.
  2. Load and add “regular” data.
  3. Manipulate (spatial) data.
  4. Plot map.
